title: Standardize Agent Docker Workflow via docker-exec
description: Standardize agent-flywheel to use Method 4 (Per-Project Container Config) exclusively, where agents run via 'docker exec' into project-specific containers. This provides isolated, reproducible environments for each project while maintaining seamless agent access to code, credentials, and tools. Includes complete infrastructure: Dockerfile templates, container lifecycle management, credential mounting, NTM integration, and comprehensive documentation.
